Params: {3: 'Meanwhile, Lee hands a tiny patch to Lucia behind his back. Lucia pats the smuggler on his shoulder.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Tell me, why are you being hunted by the KCC?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Smuggler', 3: "Please, don't... don't kill me. I... I'm just an errand runner and messenger.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Smuggler', 3: 'My boss, Zack... ran to the other side of the island. Said he needed to catch an airship or something...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'That smuggler is headed to a mountain.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'So you let him go on purpose, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Stay alert. I think he's still hiding something.", 4: '1'}
